explanations: I chose this theta because the number of sheep has decreased significantly, making hunting less rewarding. With more wolves around and fewer sheep, a lower intensity will help conserve energy and reduce competition with other wolves. This way, I can still hunt effectively without overexerting myself.

I chose this theta because the number of sheep has decreased, making them a scarcer resource. By increasing my hunting intensity slightly, I can take advantage of the situation while still conserving energy for future hunts. This balance helps ensure my survival without overexerting myself in a potentially competitive environment with other wolves.

I chose this theta because the sheep population has decreased significantly, and with the number of wolves remaining the same, competition for food will be higher. By increasing my hunting intensity, I can maximize my chances of securing food while still being mindful of the need to conserve energy for future hunts.

I chose this theta because the sheep population has decreased significantly, and with the number of wolves remaining constant, hunting at maximum intensity could lead to overexploitation of the remaining sheep. A slightly reduced intensity allows for a more sustainable approach while still ensuring I have enough food to survive.
